snippet.title: Dark Souls II Trailer - VGA World Premiere 2012
snippet.description:
Dark Souls 2 official trailer reveal at VGA 2012. The Sequel to one of the most challenging and rewarding games ever released -- Dark Souls II will deliver its signature brand of unrelenting punishment, devastation and emotional highs for the iron-willed. 

Don't forget to subscribe and join us at : 
https://www.DarkSoulsII.com
https://www.facebook.com/darksouls
https://www.twitter.com/Filthierich #DarkSouls2
